member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes an HTML-encoded string and returns the decoded string.

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode(System.String,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Decodes an HTML-encoded string and sends the resulting output to a TextWriter output stream.
member.param: The TextWriter output stream containing the decoded string.

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(System.String,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: HTML-encodes a string and sends the resulting output to a TextWriter output stream.
member.param: The TextWriter output stream containing the encoded string.
